price: Lalle ne mubazzarai sun kasance 'yan'uwan shaiɗanu. Kuma Shaiɗan ya kasance ga Ubangijinsa, mai yawan kãfirci.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُبَذِّرِينَ كَانُوٓاْ إِخۡوَٰنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِرَبِّهِۦ كَفُورٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-mubadhirīna kānū ikh'wāna al-shayāṭīni wakāna al-shayṭānu lirabbihi kafūran
